Text: Great! How about vol. 1? Someone got that one? Would be great. Anyways, thanks very much for this torrent.

Thanks xyzzy, for explaining for Noffes what I mean. Because he can't read, he just throws out stupid comments about how I can't read. Volume 1, and not Disc 1, is what I mean, just as  I wrote.

I have Mickey Mouse in Living Color Volume 1 in NTSC too, but you have to wait a week or two or three before I can help you out. Uploading at a reasonable speed takes all my bandwidth, and I would like to get some stuff for myself first.  :) 

Volume 1 exist in PAL countries also, but I do not own that version.  

Be good now and upload at least as much as you download and I might share some more cartoons. 

A Merry Christmas to you all! (Just a few more days of frantic christmas shopping..)
Thanks, Xpern. That would be awsome! NTSC works just as well as the PAL version for me. Thnks very much, and Merry Chrstmas!
Please seed this torrent. I've been looking for these movies for years and would really like to have them. Thanks in advance...
